name: TURTLE TIME!
description:
TURTLE TIME! by devin mcgee

TAP/CLICK to make him swim!!

This is a very simple game click/tap the screen to make the sea turtle avoid objects. Lets SEA how far you can get! Can you make it to 500? 

This game will continue to get updates such as score counter, added enemies,  sound and camera improvements.

I'm also working on a adventure side scroller and an FPS.

The mission behind making this game is to understand different method to control characters in a game as well as tracking and counting objects using code. This game was made for fun and educational purposes.
